channel.title: Error Help
channel.description:
[code]client.java:21290: 'else' without 'if' } else if (XinterfaceID == 8762 && server.cookinghandler.iscooking) { //cooking x amount raw fish ^ client.java:21321: orphaned case case 60: //Enter Name? ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Is The Error! Please Help

item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott

Man i take it you don’t even know java… lol due to the else and if question.
[/quote]
i take it u dont kno anything u just said ![/quote]

He blaitanly does, or he wouldn’t post it, every sane person can understand it…

item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

case 208: //Enter Amount Part 2 int EnteredAmount = inStream.readDWord(); if (XinterfaceID == 8762 && server.cookinghandler.iscooking) { //cooking x amount raw fish server.cookinghandler.cook(playerId, EnteredAmount); } if (XinterfaceID == 5064) { //remove from bag to bank bankItem(playerItems[XremoveSlot], XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 5382) { //remove from bank fromBank(bankItems[XremoveSlot], XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 3322) { //remove from bag to trade window tradeItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 3415) { //remove from trade window fromTrade(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); }else if (XinterfaceID == 3322 && duelStatus >= 1) { //remove from bag to duel window if(isUntradable(XremoveID)) sendMessage("You cannot stake this item"); else stakeItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 6669 && duelStatus >= 1) { //remove from duel window fromDuel(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } if (fletching[5] == 1) { if (EnteredAmount >= 1 && EnteredAmount <= 3) { fletching[5] = 2; fletching[6] = EnteredAmount; CheckForSkillUse(); } else { resetFL(); sendMessage("1 = arrow shafts | 2 = short bow | 3 = long bow"); sendMessage("Achey Logs: 1 = ogre arrow shafts | 2 = ogre composite bow"); } } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

case 208: //Enter Amount Part 2 int EnteredAmount = inStream.readDWord(); if (XinterfaceID == 8762 && server.cookinghandler.iscooking) { //cooking x amount raw fish server.cookinghandler.cook(playerId, EnteredAmount); if (XinterfaceID == 5064) { //remove from bag to bank bankItem(playerItems[XremoveSlot], XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 5382) { //remove from bank fromBank(bankItems[XremoveSlot], XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 3322) { //remove from bag to trade window tradeItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 3415) { //remove from trade window fromTrade(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); }else if (XinterfaceID == 3322 && duelStatus >= 1) { //remove from bag to duel window if(isUntradable(XremoveID)) sendMessage("You cannot stake this item"); else stakeItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } else if (XinterfaceID == 6669 && duelStatus >= 1) { //remove from duel window fromDuel(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); } if (fletching[5] == 1) { if (EnteredAmount >= 1 && EnteredAmount <= 3) { fletching[5] = 2; fletching[6] = EnteredAmount; CheckForSkillUse(); } else { resetFL(); sendMessage("1 = arrow shafts | 2 = short bow | 3 = long bow"); sendMessage("Achey Logs: 1 = ogre arrow shafts | 2 = ogre composite bow"); } } break;

Read full topic

@mikescott wrote:

your missing the if(something){ something2;
